headline: NEWPORT MOTION CONTROLLER/DRIVER, 4 AXIS
description: 4 Axis Stepper Motion Controller     Newport Model MM3000-4
categories.lvl2: Optical / Photonic Equipment  >  Positioning Equipment > Positioning Controllers
specstable:
Manufacturer Newport
Model MM3000-4
Description 4 Axis Stepper Motion Controller
Accessories

New in original carton
GPIO port
Joy stick port
RS 232-C port
Cables for four drives
Power cable
Operations manual
Newport 3000 Utilities:
Start up ver. 4.0
Profile ver. 3.0
EX232 ver 2.1

Other Information

This controller made for LUCENT
Three drives rated 1.6Amp
Fourth drive is rated 0.2Amp
Axis #1, #2, #3 stepper motor driver boards p/n 21092-05
Axis #4 stepper motor driver boards p/n 21092-01
4 stepper motor modules p/n 070878
Motion master board p/n 070874
MM-3000 Lucent firmware ver 3.1L

Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition New-Never Used
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Height 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Weight 28 lb (13 kg)
